Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.game_state

Class RoundState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.game_state.RoundState
public class RoundState extends Object
Class used to encapsulate the state of a round after certain "checkpoints". Can be used to save the state of the round after the preparation phase and after every action phase, but NOT in the middle of an action phase
